text: okay as you know Bangkok is a sweltering
high city and one of the best ways to
beat the heat is by eating ice cream I'm
going to take you today to eat one of my
favorite sweet treats on the streets of
Bangkok when you order an Ice Cream
Sandwich in Thailand you get the real
thing the bun is a fluffy loaf light and
slightly sweetened an optional yet I'd
highly recommend it layer of sweet
sticky Rice's first late as the
foundation a few scoops of ice cream are
placed on top and although this
particular vendor was all out of roasted
peanuts I like the addition of a nutty
crunch on top resting on a bed of sweet
sticky rice and pressed between two buns
I teamkhan Ampang or ice cream bread as
literally translated is the best way to
soak up the luscious cream as it quickly
melts in the blazing heat of Bangkok
an authentic Ice Cream Sandwich it is
actually a bun and I put sticky rice
sweet sticky rice in the bottom and then
a couple scoops of ice cream on top this
cost 15 baht which is like about 50
cents
now this is one great way to beat the
heat in Bangkok
